item.title: Fixed: oDesk API OAuth throwing a strict standard
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to share this quick fix for oDesk API OAuth type.

 

Strict Standards: Non-static method oDeskAPI::transcode() should not be called statically in {PATH}\oDeskAPI.oauth.php on line 473

I have attached a quick fix below:

https://gist.github.com/4318238
